i<M; i++) {\n            vector<int> fs = BFS(i, M, adj_list2);\n            int cnt = 0;\n            for (int f : fs)\n                cnt += (f <= k-1);\n            ans = max(ans, cnt);\n        }\n\n        vector<int> ret(N);\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            vector<int> fs = BFS(i, N, adj_list1);\n            int cnt = 0;\n            for (int f : fs)\n                cnt += (f <= k);\n            ret[i] = (cnt + ans);\n        }\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximize-the-number-of-target-nodes-after-connecting-trees-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1351}
